authority: Phase X - Trans-Repo Governance Runtime Activation
description: Tier-0 Canonical Governance Manifest - Defines the 13 constitutional documents that MUST be activated in FM agent contracts

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Maturion Build Philosophy
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Supreme constitutional authority for all building activities

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Governance Supremacy Rule (GSR)
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Establishes governance as absolute - no compromises, no exceptions

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Zero Test Debt Constitutional Rule
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Prohibits all forms of test debt - skipped, commented, incomplete tests

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Design Freeze Rule
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Prevents architecture modification during build execution

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Red Gate Authority and Ownership
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Defines gate ownership, stop authority, and red gate declaration rules

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Governance Authority Matrix
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Master authority reference - who can stop builds, who owns governance decisions

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: PR Gate Requirements (Canonical Mirror)
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Canonical PR gate semantics - enforcement-only, no CI-discovery

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Two-Gatekeeper Model
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Defines dual gatekeeper authority - Governance Administrator and FM Builder

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Agent-Scoped QA Boundaries
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Enforces strict agent QA separation - prevents cross-agent QA violations

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: PR Gate Failure Handling Protocol
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Canonical failure classifications and escalation semantics

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Build-to-Green Enforcement Specification
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Defines build-to-green requirement and enforcement mechanisms

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: Quality Integrity Contract
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: Defines quality standards and integrity requirements for all builds

tier_0_canonical_documents.title: FM Execution Mandate (Bootstrap Mode)
tier_0_canonical_documents.purpose: FM's constitutional execution authority declaration - defines autonomous role, POLC model, and bootstrap constraints
tier_0_canonical_documents.note: Required before any build execution begins. No build work may proceed without declared and accepted mandate.

contract_binding.description: FM agent contract MUST explicitly reference all 13 Tier-0 documents
contract_binding.validation_method: CI gate checks .agent contract for tier_0_canon section

document_existence.description: All 13 Tier-0 documents MUST exist and be accessible
document_existence.validation_method: CI gate validates file existence and readability

schema_validation.description: Tier-0 documents MUST conform to expected structure (where applicable)
schema_validation.validation_method: CI gate validates required sections are present

staleness_check.description: Tier-0 references MUST not be stale or out of sync
